attributes.action: Don't give married couples rights to those just living together.  Keep marriage special.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People living together should not be given the same rights as married couples.  Marriage is special and should be seen as such.  By giving them the same rights you are only encouraging cohabiting which is doing little for the good of children and diminishing the social structure of the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
